description: Name of the expected organism. Should correspond to a NCBI Taxonomy node
scientific name for any taxon below the rank of species, i.e. an infraspecific taxon or infraspecies.
The complete taxonomic lineage for the taxonomic node indicated.
Assembly DB identifier (Example: NCBI assembly accession)
NCBI taxonomy identifier of the organism.
NCBI BioProject DB ID. A BioProject is a collection of biological data for a single initiative, originating from a single organization or from a consortium.
Reflective of the Data Dictionary version currently applied to the dataset.
The platform used to conduct the analysis.
